name: Windows Vista
character_details: Vis-tan has no universally accepted design, leading to controversy within the OS-tan community. Popular designs include 'Visbou', depicted as a young ninja girl with grey hair and a red scarf, and 'Vistake', a girl in a red and white sailor fuku. The +Nijiura+ community features 'Chiivistan', a magical girl with green hair, and another unnamed design of a young girl with short grey hair.
